QuestData.Title: Skorn Must Fall!
QuestData.Description: $n, the vrykul fortress, Skorn, sits to the south. Its strange giants have recently awakened and have begun to spread, attacking us wherever they can.$B$BMy scouts inform me that they are poised to strike at us here, but I do not have the strength to repel such a force. Instead, we will prepare to leave north to less dangerous lands.$B$BI ask that you use your cunning to buy us time. I've sent a brave ahead with the details. Show this emblem at Skorn and he'll reveal himself and do all he can to aid you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Chieftain Ashtotem has asked you to use the Winterhoof Emblem at Skorn, and then to speak with the Winterhoof Brave.
QuestData.RewardText: It will be interesting to learn about your people, $c, while fighting alongside you.$B$BShall we proceed?
